stuffy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a room or building that is stuffy does not have enough fresh air in it
stuffy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: It’s getting stuffy in here – do you mind if I open the window?
stuffy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: people, occasions, or places that are stuffy are too formal and old-fashioned – used to show disapproval
stuffy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Their wedding was stuffy and formal.
